tooltip.kubejs.civilization: Carrying the civilization of a world
kubejs.tips.jigsaw1: There are other blocks in the 5X5 area northwest of the block, please clear and try again!
kubejs.tips.jigsaw_fail: Detection failed! The pattern is not finished!
kubejs.tips.jigsaw_success: The test is successful! Please collect the reward!
kubejs.tips.2048_1: There are other blocks in the 5X6 area northwest of the block, please clear and try again!
kubejs.tips.2048_success: The game is successful! Right click Start block to claim reward!
kubejs.tips.2048_success_2: The test is successful! Please collect the reward!
kubejs.tips.2048_fail_2: Detection failed! The game is not finished! Right-clicking again will clear the game!
kubejs.tips.2048_uncompleted: The game is not finished, please continue!
kubejs.tips.rightClick: The will of the world has suppressed you so that you cannot use the item!
quest.01B113AC59DC691F.title: Lost in the Lotus Crossing
quest.03D822E89F168C98.quests.11.descrip: I can use the potion brewer to multiply it
quest.03D822E89F168C98.quests.14.descrip: I can brew such a potion and then toss it into the &6Heat Decomposer&r to see what happens
I can use the potion mixer, but it must follow this buff sequence
Of course, I actually &arecommend&r using the &6Enchantment Apparatus&r to get it—it's much faster than mixing potions. You can view its enchantment recipe in JEI by pressing R on the reward potion
quest.03D822E89F168C98.title: Drinkers Are Remembered
quest.095D53D3581C6AC5.quests.8.descript: Use one crafting table and &6shift right-click&r on the side of another crafting table
quest.095D53D3581C6AC5.title: Acquired by Serendipity
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.quests.0.descript: As a scholar of civilization, I'm keen to collect the cultures of different universes
By chance, I heard of a world brimming with milk and teeming with never-before-seen creatures
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.quests.1.descript: This world is full of monsters
They all serve as valuable specimens
I'm here to gather the remains
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.quests.2.descript: To encapsulate an entire world's civilization
The chronicle of civilization must be extraordinarily robust
This world is rich in resources
I plan to craft one myself
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.quests.3.descript: Simple samples alone won't suffice for this trip
I need a wealth of data
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.quests.4.descript: Sturdy enough to bear the weight of an entire civilization's pages
The binding must also be remarkably &6pliant&r
Pliable enough to harmonize all brutal clashes
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.quests.5.descript: The requirements for the pages are simple
They must be large and sturdy
Large enough to easily support an entire civilization
Sturdy enough to keep even a whole civilization in check
quest.1D6DA84B875D63FC.title: Where Mountains and Rivers Meet
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.0.descript: The Chronicle of Civilization is your ultimate goal
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.3.descript: Press R on an item to view its recipe
Press U to view the crafting recipe
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.4.descript: You are now on the starting island
Please press the &6L key&r on your keyboard to create a team
You can use /sethome to set a home
Use /home to return to your home
Use /back to return to your previous location
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.5.descript: You can enable this marker task to double all AE2 channel transfers
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.6.descript: The modpack includes the Apotheosis mod
You can use &6Precision Harvesting&r enchanted tools or MEK's &6Cardboard Box&r to remove the mob spawner
You can view the mob spawner upgrades in JEI
If you find that some &amonster resources&r are in high demand
You might try using &amonster cotton swabs&r to craft the corresponding &amob spawn eggs&r
&8&m(Unbound Fire Spirits and Guardians also count)&r&r
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.8.descript: 1. If during gameplay JEI shows a recipe but the machine malfunctions or won't accept ingredients, enter the &a/reload&r command to reset the game &8&m(This is an issue with the universal mechanics mod)&r&8&r
2. If recipes are missing, enter the &a/reload&r command to reset the game &m&8(This is a JEI issue)&r&m&r
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.9.descript: You can check this marker to reset AE2 channels to their default state
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.10.descrip: You are free to choose between using AE or RS
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.quests.11.descrip: 1. The fluid milk in this world is &6not&r Minecraft's vanilla milk
2. Milk in buckets is &6Minecraft's vanilla&r milk
3. To insert a milk bucket into the &6New Arcane Pedestal&r, use a hopper or item pipe
4. To fill a tank or fluid drawer with milk: (1) use an electric pump or hose pulley to extract milk and channel it via fluid pipes
(2) use the animal resource harvester to extract cow milk, then output it automatically or via pipes; (3) use MEK's fluid tank—open its GUI and place the milk bucket into the output slot
quest.276A4E123AE3F391.title: Introduction
quest.2D3341665F965B95.quests.0.title: Agriculture Chapter
quest.2D3341665F965B95.title: When Grass Grows and Birds Sing
quest.386F3F87B3F6E5B5.quests.0.title: Monster Chapter
quest.386F3F87B3F6E5B5.title: The Wandering Stranger
quest.3C548116E045F452.quests.12.descrip: 1. Multiblock structures support sizes from 3x3 to 7x7
2. The matrix frame can only be used on the edges of the structure
3. The matrix wall can only be placed on the six faces excluding the edges
4. The assembly room's interior must be completely filled
5. Up to 5 Speed Cores can be placed &8(placing more has no effect)&r

6. Each Assembly Core adds an 8-unit concurrent processing limit to the room, which maxes out at 800—in a maximum 7x7 assembly room, you can place up to &b100 Assembly Cores&r; excluding 5 Speed Cores, all remaining slots are for Template Cores
quest.3C548116E045F452.quests.17.title: Or RS
quest.3C548116E045F452.quests.20.descrip: Quantum Item Storage Component: Offers a large capacity, but only supports one type
Quantum Fluid Storage Component: Offers a large capacity, but only supports one type
quest.3C548116E045F452.quests.20.title: Quantum Drawer
quest.3C548116E045F452.quests.21.descrip: Digital Singularity Item Storage Component: Possesses almost infinite capacity, but supports only one type
Digital Singularity Fluid Storage Component: Possesses almost infinite capacity, but supports only one type
quest.3C548116E045F452.quests.21.title: Digital Drawer
quest.3C548116E045F452.title: Crossing the Milky Way
quest.3FC92E329B46F702.quests.0.title: Forestry Chapter
quest.3FC92E329B46F702.title: A Wanderer of the Woods
quest.4E8A6E5802D4B85B.quests.0.descript: It seems that the Sprite's magic source and oak saplings can react with each other
Occult Oak Saplings from Another Realm
quest.4E8A6E5802D4B85B.quests.9.descript: It can provide ample storage space for the Chronicle of Civilization
I should do a bit more
quest.4E8A6E5802D4B85B.quests.11.title: The End
quest.4E8A6E5802D4B85B.title: Heaven and Earth, United in Strength
quest.507330DF92BE29BF.quests.0.title: Fishing Chapter
quest.507330DF92BE29BF.title: Harboring Only a Longing for Fish
quest.636B653B05302AF3.quests.15.descrip: What is this thing used for?
Of course, it's used to make &6Fission Fuel&r
quest.636B653B05302AF3.quests.19.descrip: Use a &6laser&r to activate the mining device
quest.636B653B05302AF3.quests.28.descrip: If you don't want to build a salt tower
quest.636B653B05302AF3.title: A Dream of Stars and Rivers
quest.65A3EFC947E1A2FE.quests.0.title: New World
quest.65A3EFC947E1A2FE.quests.1.title: The Nether
quest.65A3EFC947E1A2FE.quests.2.title: The End
quest.65A3EFC947E1A2FE.title: Heaven and Earth Unbound
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.0.descript: I remember I brought some saplings
Where did I put them again?
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.0.title: Where Did I Put Them?
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.1.descript: Did I teleport from the underground level 2?
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.2.descript: The milk here seems a bit unusual
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.2.title: Magical Sapling
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.4.descript: Hold &6shift + right-click&r to decompose a storage unit into storage cells
One &664k Storage Cell&r can be crafted or deconstructed into &63 16k Storage Cells&r
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.5.descript: Any kind of Supreme Wood plank
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.6.title: Any Wood
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.10.descrip: We only need 4 blocks of dirt
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.12.descrip: I remember there's an anvil at &6home&r
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.13.descrip: I know where to find a furnace
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.15.descrip: Did you think I was going to copy it?
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.16.descrip: Hold the magical talisman and &6right-click&r to learn it
Hold the Beginner's Spellbook and press &aC&r to open the spell page
Then, &6in order&r, select the &6projectile&r in the first column and the &6lightning&r in the third column, click &6craft&r in the bottom right, then exit the page
With the Beginner's Spellbook in hand, &6hold&r the &aV&r key to select the spell you just crafted
Right-click on the ground to cast the spell
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.16.title: Milk Ore Production
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.17.descrip: Just insert them into AE's &6ME Driver&r, and you can continuously extract cobblestone and water from the terminal
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.18.descrip: I might achieve better ore production without upgrading the sieve mesh to the highest level
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.19.descrip: I might not need to upgrade the sieve mesh to the highest level for better ore production
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.20.descrip: I might not need to upgrade the sieve mesh to the highest level for better ore production
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.21.descrip: I might not need to upgrade the sieve mesh to the highest level for better ore production
I can continue placing milk on the sieve
But I'd prefer to place a &adiamond block&r
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.22.descrip: I might not need to upgrade the sieve mesh to the highest level for better ore production
I can continue placing milk on the sieve
But I'd prefer to place a &anext-tier alloy block&r
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.23.descrip: &6Sieve Mesh&r should be able to sieve out gravel, right?
&8At minimum, a copper sieve mesh is required&r
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.28.descrip: I can use the infusion chamber to set up a basic double ore farm
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.28.title: Simple Double Ore Mine
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.30.descrip: Remember to ignite &6below the Apothecary's Crucible&r to heat it
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.31.descrip: Get yourself a bottle of that magical potion!
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.32.descrip: I can try to summon some creatures from this world
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.34.descrip: Let's dive to the ocean floor
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.35.descrip: I've discovered a block deep in this world that I've never seen before
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.36.descrip: It seems to be a moment of epiphany
I want to build a portal on this never-before-seen material
A Nether portal can &6only&r be built above bedrock
Remember to drink the milk around the portal&r if needed
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.36.title: The Nether
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.37.descrip: I can use lightning to split rocks
quest.6F0C33C428443125.quests.45.descrip: This thing has an indestructible version
quest.6F0C33C428443125.title: I Wrestle with Myself
quest.70BC973DDE20E507.title: Moonlight in the High Tower
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.0.descript: This chapter is purely for fun and has &6absolutely no&r impact on game progression
Players may choose to participate at will
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.1.descript: Right-click to place the &apuzzle block (example)&r on the ground
Assemble the puzzle according to the given pattern
Hint: Right-click the puzzle block to move it
After moving, right-click the &apuzzle block (example)&r to check if it's complete
If successful, you will receive a reward
Note: Occasionally an error in the generated pattern may occur when placing blocks. Simply try again
2. Once placed, the puzzle blocks cannot be manually mined (&4they are indestructible&r) until the puzzle is solved
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.2.descript: Use the rewards earned in-game for a lottery draw
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.2.title: Lottery 1
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.3.descript: Use the rewards earned in-game for a lottery draw
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.3.title: Lottery 2
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.4.descript: Use the rewards earned in-game to make purchases
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.4.title: Shop 1
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.5.descript: Use the rewards earned in-game to make purchases
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.5.title: Shop 2
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.quests.6.descript: Right-click to place &a2048 Start Game&r on the ground
Hint: Right-click to move the blocks up, down, left, or right
After moving, right-click &a2048 Start Game&r to check if it's complete
If the check is successful, you will receive a reward
If the grid fills up and no moves remain, right-click &a2048 Start Game&r to clear the board
Note: Occasionally, errors in the generated pattern may occur when placing blocks. Simply try again
2. Once placed, the puzzle blocks cannot be manually mined (&4they are indestructible&r) until the puzzle is solved
quest.7136232AC6D247D0.title: How Many Springs Can There Be?

quest.771EC0B7C4BE2135.quests.26.descrip: Cinnamon can be obtained by &6right-clicking&r on cinnamon wood with an axe
quest.771EC0B7C4BE2135.title: Late Comes the Snow
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.0.descript: This is a unique stone imbued with subtle magic
I can use it to craft something
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.3.title: Mystical Flower
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.5.descript: They can be used for forging the Chronicle of Civilization
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.5.title: Living Stone and Living Wood
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.7.descript: This is a conversion device as I know it
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.8.descript: Insert &6redstone dust&r into the Altar of Light
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.20.descrip: Flame Ore Orchid can only operate in the &6Nether&r
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.26.descrip: It seems that these types of leaves can be sieved out
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.quests.31.descrip: &6Rune Morning Glory&r, once bound to a mana pool, can automatically craft items on a rune pedestal
quest.7C67FB908DDA9C27.title: The Flowers on the Ridge Bloom Again
quest.7FFB7A4B2B6F1435.quests.8.descript: I don't need to craft higher-tier runes
quest.7FFB7A4B2B6F1435.title: A Long Song in the Pine Breeze
